channel.title: 2 more issue.. slayer and pop up websites
channel.description:
how do u allow the user 2 get 99 slayer right when they first play.. if someone could provide the code that would be great...
also during the loading of the client i want the forums 2 open when i load the client..and also for them 2 vote... so opening internet pages on command.
how do i do that?

item.title: 2 more issue.. slayer and pop up websites
item.dc:creator: @phillip7112 phillip7112
item.description:
@phillip7112 wrote:

slayer thing did not work… when i tried 2 make a new character the screen was black and the intro messages kept looping…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 06, 2010, 06:53:24 pm[/size][hr]bump…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2010, 05:20:10 pm[/size][hr]still need help[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2010, 05:33:37 pm[/size][hr]fixed slayer…

when i right click it doesn’t say view source…

Read full topic
item.source: 2 more issue.. slayer and pop up websites

item.title: 2 more issue.. slayer and pop up websites
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_k4t3 0wn3r k4t3
item.description:
@0wn3r_k4t3 wrote:

[quote=“Kingen50cent, post:5, topic:324153”][quote author=0wn3r k4t3 link=topic=420553.msg3089379#msg3089379 date=1262750183]
ok. go to the website u want it to do. rightclick > view source > (opens notepad) Save it to like vote.html
than put it in your client folder. than in run.bat or w/e do STARTER vote.html
[/quote]
start vote.html[/quote]

Oops, wasnt paying attention lolz ya. START

item.title: 2 more issue.. slayer and pop up websites
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

k to make your players have 99 slayer.

Go to client.java (main class)

Search starter

under it add addSkillxp(19, 200000000);//change the 19 to w.e slayer is

item.title: 2 more issue.. slayer and pop up websites
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

You could use a batch file command so when they click the run.bat it would open up a site.

the batch file command is ‘start’, by the way.
